reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dependable Power on Demand: Amazon Basics 48-Pack AA Alkaline Batteries
reviews.reviewText: In the realm of everyday essentials, the Amazon Basics 48-Pack AA Alkaline High-Performance Batteries has proven to be an indispensable addition to my household. This bulk pack of reliable batteries not only offers exceptional value but also ensures a dependable power source for a multitude of devices.The standout feature of these batteries is undoubtedly their consistent high performance. With a reliable 1.5-volt output, they have powered through various demanding devices in my home, from TV remotes and gaming controllers to digital cameras and wireless keyboards. The stability of their power output has eliminated the frustration of unexpected device failures, providing a seamless experience across the board.The impressive 10-year shelf life is a game-changer, allowing me to stock up on batteries without concerns about degradation over time. This long-term reliability ensures that I always have a readily available power supply for devices in storage or those requiring infrequent use. It's a convenience that adds a layer of assurance to my battery stockpile.Durability is another noteworthy aspect of these batteries. They demonstrate resilience in high-drain devices, maintaining their power output consistently. The Amazon Basics AA batteries have proven to be a dependable choice, even in gadgets that demand a sustained and reliable energy source.As a conscious consumer, I appreciate the environmentally friendly design of these batteries. Being free from harmful substances such as mercury and cadmium aligns with my commitment to sustainable choices. The responsible disposal options further contribute to their eco-friendly profile.The packaging of the 48-pack is practical and well-organized. The clear labeling and compact arrangement make it easy to store while providing quick access to the right battery size when needed. The cost-effectiveness of purchasing in bulk, combined with the reliable performance, makes these batteries a sensible and economical choice for powering everyday devices.In conclusion, the Amazon Basics 48-Pack AA Alkaline High-Performance Batteries, with a 1.5-volt output and a 10-year shelf life, exemplify a winning combination of reliability and affordability. Whether for common household gadgets or electronics demanding consistent power, these batteries have consistently delivered the performance I rely on. I highly recommend them to fellow consumers seeking a trustworthy and cost-effective solution for their battery needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These batteries seem to last a long time like the big brand batteries that you would expect. Much cheaper buying a bit set like this than purchasing a few at a time. I love that these batteries work with my xbox controller for some reason I have issues with some batteries working with it but these get the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Power Source - Amazon Basics AA Batteries
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Amazon Basics 48-Pack AA Alkaline Batteries, and I'm thoroughly impressed. These batteries provide a reliable and consistent power source for various devices.With a 1.5-volt output, they're perfect for a wide range of gadgets, from remote controls to toys. The 48-pack ensures I always have a steady supply on hand, and the 10-year shelf life is a game-changer, offering long-term usability without worrying about performance decline.The batteries have proven to be durable and long-lasting. I've used them in high-drain devices, and they've held up exceptionally well, delivering consistent power until the end of their lifespan.The packaging is straightforward, and the batteries are easy to store. The affordable price point for a pack of 48 makes them a cost-effective choice for anyone looking to stock up on reliable batteries without breaking the bank.In summary, the Amazon Basics AA Alkaline Batteries exceed expectations in terms of performance, longevity, and value for money. For a hassle-free power solution, these batteries get a well-deserved 5-star rating. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewerName: Honest feedback from an honest guyHonest feedback from an honest guy
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Watt You Need to Know: A Shockingly Good Product & Deal
reviews.reviewText: Ah, batteries - the unsung heroes of our modern digital & gadget filled world. The Amazon Basics Batteries, are a reliable choice that offers quality and value in equal measure. Now, I know we've all been tempted by those bargain-bin brands, but let's face it: they're about as useful as a chocolate teapot. With Amazon Basics, however, I've always found long-lasting power and a surprisingly pleasant quality "hand feel."When I stock up on these AA batteries, my collection box runneth over. And trust me, that's a good thing! Between remote controls, game controllers, and countless other gadgets, there's always something in need of a little more juice. With a 10-year shelf life and leak-free design, these Amazon Basics batteries never leave me high and dry.While writing this review, I checked six nearby battery-powered items (just for kicks). Half of them were already running on Amazon Basics batteries! The other half? Well, they came with their own batteries in the product box, so I can't fault them for that. But when it's time for a swap, you can bet I'll be reaching for the Amazon Basics.Amazon Basics batteries aren't just limited to AA and AAA sizes. Amazon's battery lineup has got me covered from A to Zinc (see what I did there?), with button cells, D batteries, and more. The packaging is crisp and clear, so I always find the right fit in a jiffy, especially since they are bright orange in a sea of toned down basic colors inside of my battery surplus box.One part of Amazon Basics Batteries that I appreciate is the that they take a stand for the environment. With a longer lifespan than your run-of-the-mill disposables, they'll make fewer trips to the landfill and help reduce the eco-impact of battery production and disposal. Amazon Basics batteries leave behind the hazardous materials like cadmium, mercury, and lead, all notorious for their toxicity to humans and Mother Earth. They are crafted with eco-friendlier materials, such as alkaline and nickel-metal hydride. The packaging for Amazon Basics batteries is also green as it's designed to be recyclable, it ensures that even the final resting place for your batteries is eco-conscious.While I'm a fan of Amazon Basics Batteries, there's one minor gripe that keeps me from giving them a perfect score. I've noticed that they may not last quite as long as some big brand name batteries in power-hungry devices. However, Amazon Basic Batteries make up for that with their price, quality, quantity, shipping times, and convenience. These batteries perform admirably in devices with lower power requirements, like TV remotes and wireless keyboards. But when it comes to gadgets that rapidly drain batteries, these do not appear to be the top choice. I'm just very mindful of the amount of batteries I go through, as I'd rather not contribute excessively to e-waste, especially with batteries. Despite this minor shortcoming, Amazon Basics Batteries remain a solid choice for most everyday devices.For the power hungry devices or devices that are needing a longer lasting battery, I tend to go with the more expensive Lithium Ion batteries. For everything else these do beautifully. It's a win for my devices, wallet and the planet. I highly recommend them and they are my preferred choice for needing a good replacement to basic household batteries.Supplemental items shown here:https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B09364DK3P - Battery box with foam battery cutouts

Als ich zum ersten Mal die Amazon Basic Batterien bestellte, hatte ich nie gedacht, dass sie ein so großartiges Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis bieten würden. Doch mittlerweile habe ich sie vor zwei Jahren zum ersten Mal bestellt und bestelle sie nun alle drei bis vier Monate immer wieder - ich bin total zufrieden!Die Haltbarkeit dieser Batterien hat mich wirklich beeindruckt. Egal ob in meinem Fernseher fernbedienung meiner Kamera oder meinem xbox Controllern, sie halten zuverlässig und lange. Ich bin regelmäßig überrascht, wie lange sie in Geräten halten, die einen hohen Energieverbrauch haben. Es war für mich eine wahre Erleichterung zu sehen, dass ich nicht ständig die Batterien wechseln muss.Neben ihrer beeindruckenden Leistung bin ich auch mit dem Preis zufrieden. Im Vergleich zu anderen Markenbatterien sind die Amazon Basics deutlich günstiger und bieten dennoch die gleiche, wenn nicht sogar bessere Leistung. Ich habe es ausprobiert und kann mit Sicherheit sagen, dass diese Batterien eine echte Alternative zu teureren Produkten darstellen.Die Tatsache, dass ich alle drei bis vier Monate neue Batterien kaufen muss, zeigt, wie langlebig sie sind. Die Batterien sind nicht von minderwertiger Qualität, sondern bieten tatsächlich eine starke und langlebige Leistung. Das hat mich überzeugt.Zusammenfassend lässt sich sagen, dass ich von den Amazon Basic Batterien begeistert bin. Ihre beeindruckende Leistung und Langlebigkeit haben mich wirklich überzeugt. Ich kann sie allen empfehlen, die nach zuverlässigen und bezahlbaren Batterien suchen. Der Kauf lohnt sich auf jeden Fall!Note: ★★★★★

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on January 19, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Best value and cheapest batteries and they last a long time compared to other brands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These batteries were purchased to use in radio mics for shows at school. They last extremely well, matching much more expensive branded batteries in this situation. I went down a rabbit hole, researching batteries and trying to find out if you had to pay more for better batteries, and my findings were worrying. Expensive is definitely not better. In fact some of the most expensive batteries, blowing their trumpets loud and clear, underperformed woefully in many tests. These Amazon cheapies were by no means the best in the tests that others have performed, but they gave a very good account of themselves, and this is my experience of them so far.
